attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should our great country be told what to do by unelected people in other eu countries,If the EU gets it way we will be  the united states of europe and the great british pound lost forever, we may be a small Island but we dont need europe to survive.
Our great country shaped the world like it is today-dont let it be destroyed forever,were Bitish not european.SIGN ERE FOR A PETITION TO VOTE US OUT OF EUROPE AND TO SAVE BRITAIN.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
